imdb.title: Allergy Actress Cooking with Mary Beth Eversole
akas: Allergy Actress Cooking with Mary Beth Eversole (United States)
plot: Host, and food allergy sufferer, Mary Beth Eversole takes the audience through delectable modifications of everyday recipes to make food fun for everyone again.
